title: A proclamacion declaryng the Quenes Maiesties purpose, to kepe peace with Fraunce and Scotlande, and to prouyde for the suretie of hir kyngdomes
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: In Powles Churchyarde by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood printers to the Quenes Maiestie,
notes: A proclamation declaring the queen's intention to keep the peace with France and Scotland.
Three hundred and fifty copies were printed in English, sixty each in French and Italian--STC.
At foot of page: Cum priuilegio Regi√¶ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
